TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Action<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4,in T5,in T6,in T7>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`7<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, - T5, - T6, - T7> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, In T5, In T6, In T7)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4, arg5 As T5, arg6 As T6, arg7 As T7)
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7> public delegate void Action(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7);

summary.span: 封裝具有 7 個參數且沒有傳回值的方法。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has seven parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用做為參數傳遞給方法，而不必明確宣告自訂委派的委派。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應到這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須有七個參數，所有傳遞給它的值，而且必須傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have seven parameters that are all passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. (在 C# 中，此方法必須傳回`void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必須由定義`Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` 建構。construct. 它也可以傳回值，則會忽略這個值的方法。）通常，這種方法用來執行作業。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考的方法有七個參數並傳回值，使用泛型改為委派。To reference a method that has seven parameters and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 您也可以使用委派與匿名方法和 lambda 運算式。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods and lambda expressions.
